inputs.name: input_zip
inputs.description: A zip file containing a directory of input video files

outputs.name: output_frames_dir
outputs.description: A directory in which to write the resized frames

outputs.name: output_zip
outputs.description: A zip file containing a directory of resized video files

parameters.name: scale
parameters.description: A numeric scale factor to apply to the input resolution

parameters.name: ffmpeg_out_opts
parameters.description: An array of ffmpeg output options

parameters.name: max_size
parameters.description: A maximum (width, height) allowed for the video. Dimensions can be -1, in which case no constraint is applied to them

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: A desired output (width, height) of the video. Dimensions can be -1, in which case the input aspect ratio is preserved
